item.content:encoded:
Last week IBM announced the general availability of Watson NLP and Watson Speech. You can now run these services via containers everywhere.

I’ve created a short video that describes how complete solutions can be deployed and how automation via Terraform and Argo CD can be used.

To find out more about these capabilities, check out these resources:

  • Watson Automation Repo
  • TechZone Accelerator Toolkit
  • Watson NLP
